title: Snag an M4 MacBook Pro 14-inch for $1,399 with free next day delivery
description: Holiday price cuts are in effect for Christmas and Hanukkah, as Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip has plunged to $1,399.Get Apple's M4 MacBook Pro for just $1,399 - Image credit: AppleThe $1,399 price at B&H Photo and Amazon is thanks to a holiday price war between the two Apple Authorized Resellers. With the entry model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to last year's 8GB, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price.Buy for $1,399 Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Holiday price cuts are in effect for Christmas and Hanukkah, as Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip has plunged to $1,399.
text: Holiday price cuts are in effect for Christmas and Hanukkah, as Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip has plunged to $1,399. The $1,399 price at B&H Photo and Amazon is thanks to a holiday price war between the two Apple Authorized Resellers. With the entry model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to last year's 8GB, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price. Buy for $1,399 At press time, units are in stock in Space Black at B&H with free next business day delivery as soon as Friday on orders shipped within the contiguous U.S. Amazon has the Space Black colorway on backorder, but you can still secure the $1,399 price (select accounts may see an on-page coupon, while other accounts will see a full instant rebate for the $200 price cut). You can also find deals on upgraded configure-to-order (CTO) models in our M4 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide. Every M4 Pro and M4 Max model is also on sale at up to $300 off in our Mac Price Guide. Prices start at $1,699. Here are a few top picks from the MacBook Pro sale: 14-inch M4, 16GB, 512GB, Space Black: $1,399 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off) 14-inch M4, 16GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,599 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off) 14-inch M4, 24GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,749 at B&H and at Amazon ($250 off) 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $1,699 ($300 off) 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,229 ($270 off) with promo code APINSIDER at Adorama
html:
Holiday price cuts are in effect for Christmas and Hanukkah, as Apple's latest MacBook Pro with an M4 chip has plunged to $1,399.

The $1,399 price at B&H Photo and Amazon is thanks to a holiday price war between the two Apple Authorized Resellers. With the entry model now including 16GB of unified memory compared to last year's 8GB, the Late 2024 14-inch MacBook Pro offers additional value for the price.

Buy for $1,399

At press time, units are in stock in Space Black at B&H with free next business day delivery as soon as Friday on orders shipped within the contiguous U.S.

Amazon has the Space Black colorway on backorder, but you can still secure the $1,399 price (select accounts may see an on-page coupon, while other accounts will see a full instant rebate for the $200 price cut). You can also find deals on upgraded configure-to-order (CTO) models in our M4 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide.

Every M4 Pro and M4 Max model is also on sale at up to $300 off in our Mac Price Guide. Prices start at $1,699.

Here are a few top picks from the MacBook Pro sale:

  • 14-inch M4, 16GB, 512GB, Space Black: $1,399 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off)
  • 14-inch M4, 16GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,599 at B&H and at Amazon ($200 off)
  • 14-inch M4, 24GB, 1TB, Space Black: $1,749 at B&H and at Amazon ($250 off)
  • 14-inch M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $1,699 ($300 off)
  • 16-inch M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 512GB: $2,229 ($270 off) with promo code APINSIDER at Adorama
